ygData.messageBody:
there are two major problems as it is.

right now, when you feign, ALL things on your hate list get a save. if even
ONE of them makes the save, they will continue to hit you, and tip you off
to everything else. therefore, pulling areas with lots of uber monsters,
such as fire giants or PoF, is made virtually impossible, predictability or not.

second, even if you feign when nothing is around, everything that wanders
near you gets a save realize you are faking. so now, even if your feign is
successful, you can still be hosed.

in short, the reply was BS. it did not accurately portray how feign worked
before, and it left out a few juicy points about how it works now.

monks who have played 1000s of hours and basically live or die by feign
death (no pun intended) know what they are talking about. and they have
every right to protest this nonsense.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
